reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a business designed hotel with nice amenities (Wi-Fi, Parking, Free breakfast), but it is located 10 minutes outside city center. Everything closed up early in the area so there is not much to do unless you have a car. If it wasn't for the loud door slams you heard throughout the building, it might have gotten a higher rating. Even if you tried to close doors quietly, they would still slam making it tough to sleep.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived and at reception were met by a small smiling Canadian receptionist and a slim foreign young besuited man who we took to be in charge. He showed us to our double en-suite room and left us there. It took a few minutes for us to register that the room was already festooned with another guest's belongings. We retreated to reception and were shown to a second room. This one was fine but lacked any covering for the window. No room phones meant another trip to reception where on pointing out the lack of window blind we were shown to a third room. A quick look round the door revealed a twin room not the double we required. Back to reception and a fourth room was located and this one was were we stayed. Not a bad room at all. Fresh decor a lavishly illuminated bed featuring 2 wall lights and no fewer than three bedside lights. Beyond the lights the room was cluttered with unnecessary furniture, who needs 2 tall chests of drawers, a nest of tables and an electric fan when there is insufficient floor space to open our suitcase. The ensuite with shower was good.
reviews.title: Nearly but not quite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was not serviced after the first night, when I mentioned this to the man on reception it was clear that he had lost track of our location in the hotel...not surprising perhaps.
reviews.title: Check whether you are in the attic
Superb in "I'll be back" way
reviews.text: To be fair an older manager offered us complimentary drinks as compensation for the initial incompetence when we reappeared at reception.

There were some good points too. The dining room was a lovely space and the cooked breakfast great. The public rooms were neat and comfortable. The car park allowing off street parking behind gates was reassurring but crowded.
reviews.title: wonderful

reviews.text: Can't put a finger on why I actually liked this palce, it's a bit tired, a bit like a maze, my TV didn't work, and I was stuck in the attic.
reviews.title: Odd, but weirdly comfy.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BUT...the staff were amazingly friendly and helpful. Was very quiet, thus a good nights sleep, and excellent breakfast the next morning.
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I were very impressed with the service we received. We had a early ferry to Dublin the next morning. The staff arranged for the kitchen staff to come in early for us so that we could have breakfast and they even arranged a cab to take us to the ferry terminal. The best service we had while we were in England.
reviews.title: Ignore other reviews amazing little B&B

reviews.text: All i can say is fantastic place - would definately stop again. All the staff are very helpful who wait on you hand and foot!!! The food is outta this world you can eat as much or as little as you like (continental or the good old full english). The rooms are a little on the small side - but they are very clean. You get complimentry tea+coffee supplies in you room along with choclate mints yummy.
reviews.title: Renovations in progress detracted from my stay here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes its out in the bronx state of liverpool but once your in the hotel you can forget whats going on on the outside. Loved it here and im looking forward in going again. Thanks for having us.
reviews.title: Don't be Fooled

reviews.text: stayed at this hotel for just one night with friends to do some christmas shopping. what a lovely and warm welcome. nothing was too much trouble for the staff. they were very helpful and pleasant at all times. rooms very clean. private free parking for guests and the gates were being locked overnight. will definitely return to this guesthouse.
reviews.title: warm welcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 1 night in October and found the Beech Mount to be very good value for money.
reviews.title: Highly recommend - clean,comfortable and great breakfast

reviews.text: Room was quite small but comfortable and modern
reviews.title: What a gem of a place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was a buffet style with lots of choice and excellent quality
reviews.title: Excellent... Staff second to none and exceeded our expectations...

reviews.text: Well worth giving it a go for a short break
reviews.title: Fantastic breakfast,extremly friendly staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excceded our expectations. Comfortable room. The buffet breafast was a revelation, of excellent quality, everything you could want and plenty of it. Ideal location with free car park and being a 10 minute bus ride out of the city centre with buses at least every 10 mins. Friendly and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Excellent breakfast comfortable rooms

reviews.text: Friendly and helpful management and staff. Clean and comfortable bedrooms. Great breakfast with plentiful choice. Very pleasant lounges.
reviews.title: Second visit already booked

reviews.text: I stayed at the Beech Mount twice in a week, just for one night each time. The staff were very welcoming, asking why I was staying, and had a bit of a chat. I had 2 differently furnished rooms, but both were good, beds were comfy.
reviews.title: friendly staff, good breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is excellent, buffet style, cold meats and cheese, croissants, cereals, variety of juices, and traditional English breakfast. I'd stay here again.
reviews.title: Wow, we will be back

reviews.text: Stayed at the Beech Mount a couple of weeks ago, value for money is an understatement, when we arrived it was freezing outside, it was a pleasure to walk through the doors, warm and cozy, beatifully decorated. That was just the reception and bar. Then when we got to the room the same again. The breakfast was delicious, with so much to choose from. Will be back without a doubt.
reviews.title: If you want to catch a cold stay at the Beech Mount Hotel
